channel.title: Comments on: TUTORIAL – UNIVERSAL ANDROID SSL PINNING IN 10 MINUTES WITH FRIDA

item.title: By: omespino
item.dc:creator: omespino
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/tutorial-universal-android-ssl-pinning-in-10-minutes-with-frida/#comment-5746">Makki</a>.
Hey, you need to install xz-utils in ubuntu per example is with "sudo apt-get install xz-utils" and you can extract that *.xz file with "unxz frida-server-12.6.11-android-arm64.xz", thanks for reading.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Makki.

Hey, you need to install xz-utils in ubuntu per example is with “sudo apt-get install xz-utils” and you can extract that *.xz file with “unxz frida-server-12.6.11-android-arm64.xz”, thanks for reading.

item.title: By: Makki
item.dc:creator: Makki
item.description:
Hi, what is the solution of this error? any help will be appreciate
[05:32:57]-[makki@cp]~/Downloads -> tar -xJf frida-server-12.6.11-android-arm64.xz tar: This does not look like a tar archive tar: Skipping to next header tar: A lone zero block at 25 tar: Exiting with failure status due to previous errors
item.content:encoded:
Hi, what is the solution of this error?
any help will be appreciate

[05:32:57]-[makki@cp]~/Downloads -> tar -xJf frida-server-12.6.11-android-arm64.xz
tar: This does not look like a tar archive
tar: Skipping to next header
tar: A lone zero block at 25
tar: Exiting with failure status due to previous errors

item.title: By: zhou
item.dc:creator: zhou
item.description: TypeError: cannot write property ‘implementation’ of undefined

item.title: By: Neal
item.dc:creator: Neal
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/tutorial-universal-android-ssl-pinning-in-10-minutes-with-frida/#comment-5186">omespino</a>.
the syntax is the same as you have post in this page and it seems correct. Maybe I have to try with a different Frida version, did you test the script only with Frida version 12.0.5?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to omespino.

the syntax is the same as you have post in this page and it seems correct.
Maybe I have to try with a different Frida version, did you test the script only with Frida version 12.0.5?

item.title: By: omespino
item.dc:creator: omespino
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/tutorial-universal-android-ssl-pinning-in-10-minutes-with-frida/#comment-5157">Neal</a>.
Hey it seems that the script is not parsed correctly maybe the copy paste or something, you can find a reference here https://github.com/frida/frida/issues/283
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Neal.

Hey it seems that the script is not parsed correctly maybe the copy paste or something, you can find a reference here https://github.com/frida/frida/issues/283

item.title: By: Neal
item.dc:creator: Neal
item.description:
Hi,
when i run the script i get the following error:
-> TypeError: cannot write property 'implementation' of undefined at [anon] (duk_hobject_props.c:3402) at [anon] (/repl1.js:10) at frida/node_modules/frida-java/lib/vm.js:42 at E (frida/node_modules/frida-java/index.js:348) at frida/node_modules/frida-java/index.js:334 at input:1 Process terminated
Can you help me to fix it please?
Thanks
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

when i run the script i get the following error:

-> TypeError: cannot write property ‘implementation’ of undefined
at [anon] (duk_hobject_props.c:3402)
at [anon] (/repl1.js:10)
at frida/node_modules/frida-java/lib/vm.js:42
at E (frida/node_modules/frida-java/index.js:348)
at frida/node_modules/frida-java/index.js:334
at input:1
Process terminated

Can you help me to fix it please?

Thanks

item.title: By: Johhny Quest
item.dc:creator: Johhny Quest
item.description:
When I run
adb shell 'su -c setenforce 0'
I receveive the error
setenforce: Needs 1 argument
item.content:encoded:
When I run

adb shell ‘su -c setenforce 0’

I receveive the error

setenforce: Needs 1 argument

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/tutorial-universal-android-ssl-pinning-in-10-minutes-with-frida/#comment-33">Divya</a>.
Did you check whether your emulator is arm or x86? Use the suitable package of frida-server.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Divya.

Did you check whether your emulator is arm or x86? Use the suitable package of frida-server.

item.title: By: omespino
item.dc:creator: omespino
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/tutorial-universal-android-ssl-pinning-in-10-minutes-with-frida/#comment-75">bremin</a>.
Hello, this means that your computer does not have connectivy with the frida-server process, you can try adb shell in order to make sure that you have connectivy with your phone and then try again the step 3, something to notice is that this method will work only if you run the frida-server as root.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to bremin.

Hello, this means that your computer does not have connectivy with the frida-server process, you can try adb shell in order to make sure that you have connectivy with your phone and then try again the step 3, something to notice is that this method will work only if you run the frida-server as root.

item.title: By: bremin
item.dc:creator: bremin
item.description:
C:\Users\Gokhan> frida-ps -U Failed to enumerate processes: unable to connect to remote frida-server: closed
I get such an error How can I solve ?
item.content:encoded:
C:\Users\Gokhan> frida-ps -U
Failed to enumerate processes: unable to connect to remote frida-server: closed

I get such an error
How can I solve ?
